thumb.title: 償い Atonement 【BGM】
thumb.description: この音楽は、聴く人を後悔と不安が渦巻く奇妙な世界へと誘う暗いメロディーを展開します。心の奥に潜む感情がふと顔を出し、聴く人を不気味な旅へ導いていきます。奇妙に歪んだ音色が織り成す音景の中で、聴く人は未知の恐怖と不安の狭間を行き来する貴重な体験ができるでしょう。暗闇に潜む怪しげな雰囲気が全体を包み込み、聴く人の心に一生忘れられない印象を残す音楽体験が待っています！This music develops a dark melody that takes the listener into a strange world of regret and anxiety. Emotions lurking deep within suddenly come to the surface, leading the listener on an eerie journey. In the soundscape woven by strangely distorted tones, listeners will have the precious experience of moving back and forth between fear and anxiety of the unknown. A mysterious atmosphere lurking in the darkness envelops the entire piece, creating a musical experience that will leave an unforgettable impression on the listener's mind for the rest of his or her life! https://twitter.com/nojisuman2525 download https://soundcloud.com/nojisuma-2588 https://www.motionelements.com/ja/artists/nojisuma https://pixabay.com/ja/users/nojisuma-23737290/ https://patreon.com/NojiSuma?utm_medium=clipboard_copy&utm_source=copyLink&utm_campaign=creatorshare_creator&utm_content=join_link https://nojimusic.base.shop
